savol: Qaysi so'z 'Apple' (olma) so'zi uchun to'g'ri artikl hisoblanadi?
I ... a student. (Nuqtalar o'rniga mos keladiganini tanlang)
Ingliz tilida haftaning birinchi kuni qaysi deb hisoblanadi (asosan)?
Qaysi rang 'Sariq' deb tarjima qilinadi?
'Go' (bormoq) fe'lining o'tgan zamon shakli (Past Simple) qaysi?
'Book' so'zining ko'plik shakli qaysi?
She ... her homework every day. (U har kuni uy vazifasini bajaradi)
'Beautiful' so'zining qarama-qarshi ma'nosi (antonym) qaysi?
Yilning qaysi oyi doim 'June' (Iyun) dan keyin keladi?
Ilovangizda 'Exit' tugmasi nima degani?
Ingliz tilida necha xil unli (vowel) harflar bor?
'Cat' (mushuk) so'ziga mos keladigan olmoshni toping.
They ... football right now. (Hozirgi davomli zamon)
'Thank you' xabariga qanday javob qaytariladi?
Qaysi son 'Twelve' (o'n ikki) deb yoziladi?
'Table' (stol) so'zining bosh harfini toping.
We eat our breakfast in the ... (Biz nonushtani ... qilamiz)
'Mother's sister' (Onangizning singlisi) kim bo'ladi?
Qaysi biri meva (fruit) emas?
'Always' so'zi o'zbek tilida nima degani?
My father ... at the hospital. (Uchinchi shaxs birlik uchun mos fe'lni tanlang)
'Better' so'zining boshlang'ich shakli (positive degree) qaysi?
Look ... the window! (Oynaga qara! Predlogni tanlang)
Ingliz tilida qaysi so'z doimo bosh harf bilan yoziladi?
I have been living here ... 2010. (Vaqtni ko'rsatuvchi predlog)
Qaysi so'z 'Fast' (tez) so'zining sinonimi hisoblanadi?
If it rains, I ... at home. (Shart ergash gap - 1-tur)
'Mouse' (sichqon) so'zining ko'plik shakli qaysi?
Which one is an irregular verb? (Qaysi biri noto'g'ri fe'l?)
I am interested ... learning English. (Predlogni tanlang)
What is the opposite of 'Rich' (boy)?
How ... sugar do you want in your tea? (Sanalmaydigan otlar uchun)
The sun ... in the East. (Tabiat hodisasi uchun doimiy zamon)
'To look for' frazali fe'lining ma'nosi nima?
This is the ... book I have ever read. (Sifatning orttirma darajasi)
Would you like ... coffee? (Taklif ma'nosida)
He is afraid ... spiders. (Predlogni tanlang)
I ... my keys yesterday. (O'tgan zamon shakli)
Which suffix makes a noun from the verb 'Teach'?
A person who flies a plane is a ...
